issue.title: [Go] Benchmark strconv.Format vs. fmt.Sprintf for CSV writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4735](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4735). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Need test out strconv.Format\{Bool,Float,Int,Uint} instead of fmt.Sprintf and see if we can improve write performance
